CancelActiveOperationTasks.title: CancelActiveOperationTasks
CancelActiveOperationTasks.summary: Cancels O\\\&M events at a time.

CancelScheduleTasks.title: CancelScheduleTasks
CancelScheduleTasks.summary: Cancels scheduled tasks that are not yet started.

CheckAccountName.title: CheckAccountName
CheckAccountName.summary: Checks whether an account name is valid or unique in a cluster.

CheckDBName.title: CheckDBName
CheckDBName.summary: Checks whether a database name is valid or whether the name is already used by another database in the current cluster.

CheckKMSAuthorized.title: CheckKMSAuthorized
CheckKMSAuthorized.summary: Queries whether the cluster is authorized to use Key Management Service (KMS).

CheckServiceLinkedRole.title: CheckServiceLinkedRole
CheckServiceLinkedRole.summary: Checks whether a service-linked role (SLR) is created.

CloseAITask.title: CloseAITask
CloseAITask.summary: Disables the PolarDB for AI feature for a cluster.

CloseDBClusterMigration.title: CloseDBClusterMigration
CloseDBClusterMigration.summary: Cancels or completes the migration task that upgrades an RDS cluster to a PolarDB cluster.

CreateAccount.title: CreateAccount
CreateAccount.summary: Creates a database account for a PolarDB cluster.

CreateActivationCode.title: CreateActivationCode
CreateActivationCode.summary: Generates a lightweight license activation code.

CreateBackup.title: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.summary: Creates a full snapshot backup for a PolarDB cluster.

CreateColdStorageInstance.title: CreateColdStorageInstance
CreateColdStorageInstance.summary: Creates a cluster that is used to store cold data.

CreateDBClusterEndpoint.title: CreateDBClusterEndpoint
CreateDBClusterEndpoint.summary: Creates a custom cluster endpoint for a PolarDB cluster.

CreateDBEndpointAddress.title: CreateDBEndpointAddress
CreateDBEndpointAddress.summary: Creates a public endpoint for the primary endpoint, the default cluster endpoint, or a custom cluster endpoint.

CreateDBNodes.title: CreateDBNodes
CreateDBNodes.summary: Adds a read-only node to a PolarDB cluster.

CreateDatabase.title: CreateDatabase
CreateDatabase.summary: Creates a database for a PolarDB cluster.

CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup
CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Creates a global IP whitelist template.

CreateOrGetVirtualLicenseOrder.title: CreateOrGetVirtualLicenseOrder
CreateOrGetVirtualLicenseOrder.summary: Creates or obtains a virtual license order.

DeleteAccount.title: DeleteAccount
DeleteAccount.summary: Deletes a database account for a PolarDB cluster.

DeleteBackup.title: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.summary: Deletes the backup sets of a PolarDB cluster.

DeleteDBClusterEndpoint.title: DeleteDBClusterEndpoint
DeleteDBClusterEndpoint.summary: Releases a custom cluster endpoint of a PolarDB cluster.

DeleteDBEndpointAddress.title: DeleteDBEndpointAddress
DeleteDBEndpointAddress.summary: Releases the public endpoints of a PolarDB cluster, including the primary endpoint, default cluster endpoint, and custom cluster endpoint.

DeleteDBLink.title: DeleteDBLink
DeleteDBLink.summary: Deletes a database link from a PolarDB for PostgreSQL (Compatible with Oracle) cluster.

DeleteDBNodes.title: DeleteDBNodes
DeleteDBNodes.summary: Deletes a read-only node from a PolarDB cluster.

DeleteDatabase.title: DeleteDatabase
DeleteDatabase.summary: Deletes a database from a PolarDB cluster.

DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup
DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Deletes a global IP whitelist template.

DeleteParameterGroup.title: DeleteParameterGroup
DeleteParameterGroup.summary: Deletes a parameter template from a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeAITaskStatus.title: DescribeAITaskStatus
DescribeAITaskStatus.summary: Queries the status of the PolarDB for AI feature.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries information about a database account of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeActivationCodeDetails.title: DescribeActivationCodeDetails
DescribeActivationCodeDetails.summary: Queries the details of an activation code.

DescribeActivationCodes.title: DescribeActivationCodes
DescribeActivationCodes.summary: Queries a list of activation codes.

DescribeActiveOperationTasks.title: DescribeActiveOperationTasks
DescribeActiveOperationTasks.summary: Queries the O\\\&M event details of an instance.

DescribeAutoRenewAttribute.title: DescribeAutoRenewAttribute
DescribeAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Queries the auto-renewal attributes of a subscription PolarDB cluster.

DescribeBackupLogs.title: DescribeBackupLogs
DescribeBackupLogs.summary: Queries backup logs and the URLs to download the backup logs.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the automatic backup policy of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeBackupTasks.title: DescribeBackupTasks
DescribeBackupTasks.summary: Queries the details of backup tasks of a cluster.

DescribeBackups.title: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.summary: Queries the backup details of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeCharacterSetName.title: DescribeCharacterSetName
DescribeCharacterSetName.summary: Queries character sets that are supported by a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeClassList.title: DescribeClassList
DescribeClassList.summary: Queries the specifications of a cluster.

DescribeDBClusterAccessWhitelist.title: DescribeDBClusterAccessWhitelist
DescribeDBClusterAccessWhitelist.summary: Queries the IP address whitelists and security groups of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterAttribute.title: DescribeDBClusterAttribute
DescribeDBClusterAttribute.summary: Queries information about a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterAuditLogCollector.title: DescribeDBClusterAuditLogCollector
DescribeDBClusterAuditLogCollector.summary: Describe SQL collector for a PolarDB cluster. Features related to SQL collector include audit log and SQL Explorer.

DescribeDBClusterAvailableResources.title: DescribeDBClusterAvailableResources
DescribeDBClusterAvailableResources.summary: Queries available resources in a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterConnectivity.title: DescribeDBClusterConnectivity
DescribeDBClusterConnectivity.summary: Queries whether the source IP address can access a cluster.

DescribeDBClusterEndpoints.title: DescribeDBClusterEndpoints
DescribeDBClusterEndpoints.summary: Queries the endpoints of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterMigration.title: DescribeDBClusterMigration
DescribeDBClusterMigration.summary: The ID of the synchronous task.

DescribeDBClusterMonitor.title: DescribeDBClusterMonitor
DescribeDBClusterMonitor.summary: Queries the interval at which the monitoring data of a PolarDB cluster is collected.

DescribeDBClusterParameters.title: DescribeDBClusterParameters
DescribeDBClusterParameters.summary: Queries the parameters of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterPerformance.title: DescribeDBClusterPerformance
DescribeDBClusterPerformance.summary: Queries the performance data of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterSSL.title: DescribeDBClusterSSL
DescribeDBClusterSSL.summary: Queries the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) settings of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterServerlessConf.title: DescribeDBClusterServerlessConf
DescribeDBClusterServerlessConf.summary: Queries the serverless configurations of a serverless cluster.

DescribeDBClusterTDE.title: DescribeDBClusterTDE
DescribeDBClusterTDE.summary: Queries the transparent data encryption (TDE) settings of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBClusterVersion.title: DescribeDBClusterVersion
DescribeDBClusterVersion.summary: Queries the information about the database engine version of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusters.title: DescribeDBClusters
DescribeDBClusters.summary: Queries PolarDB clusters or the clusters that can be accessed by an authorized RAM user.

DescribeDBClustersWithBackups.title: DescribeDBClustersWithBackups
DescribeDBClustersWithBackups.summary: Queries the information about PolarDB clusters that contain backup sets in a region.

DescribeDBInitializeVariable.title: DescribeDBInitializeVariable
DescribeDBInitializeVariable.summary: Queries attributes such as character sets and collations supported by a database in a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBLinks.title: DescribeDBLinks
DescribeDBLinks.summary: Queries the database links of a PolarDB for Oracle cluster.

DescribeDBLogFiles.title: DescribeDBLogFiles
DescribeDBLogFiles.summary: Queries logs for a PolarDB cluster such as primary/secondary switchover logs.

DescribeDBNodePerformance.title: DescribeDBNodePerformance
DescribeDBNodePerformance.summary: Queries the performance data of a node in a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDBNodesParameters.title: DescribeDBNodesParameters
DescribeDBNodesParameters.summary: Queries the parameters of a specified node in a cluster.

DescribeDBProxyPerformance.title: DescribeDBProxyPerformance
DescribeDBProxyPerformance.summary: Queries the performance data of PolarProxy.

DescribeDasConfig.title: DescribeDasConfig
DescribeDasConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of a cluster in Database Autonomy Service (DAS).

DescribeDatabases.title: DescribeDatabases
DescribeDatabases.summary: Queries the information about databases in a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeDetachedBackups.title: DescribeDetachedBackups
DescribeDetachedBackups.summary: Queries the information about the backup sets in a released PolarDB cluster.

DescribeGlobalDataNetworkList.title: DescribeGlobalDataNetworkList
DescribeGlobalDataNetworkList.summary: Queries the PolarFS global data network (GDN) details in all regions.

DescribeGlobalDatabaseNetwork.title: DescribeGlobalDatabaseNetwork
DescribeGlobalDatabaseNetwork.summary: Queries the information about a Global Database Network (GDN).

DescribeGlobalDatabaseNetworks.title: DescribeGlobalDatabaseNetworks
DescribeGlobalDatabaseNetworks.summary: Queries the information about all Global Database Networks (GDNs) that belong to an account.

DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Queries the relationship between a cluster and a global IP whitelist template.

DescribeHALogs.title: DescribeHALogs
DescribeHALogs.summary: Queries the HA logs of a cluster.

DescribeLicenseOrderDetails.title: DescribeLicenseOrderDetails
DescribeLicenseOrderDetails.summary: Queries the information of a license order.

DescribeLicenseOrders.title: DescribeLicenseOrders
DescribeLicenseOrders.summary: Queries a list of license orders.

DescribeLogBackupPolicy.title: DescribeLogBackupPolicy
DescribeLogBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the retention policy of log backups in a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeMaskingRules.title: DescribeMaskingRules
DescribeMaskingRules.summary: Queries the data masking rules of a PolarDB cluster or the information about a specified masking rule.

DescribeMetaList.title: DescribeMetaList
DescribeMetaList.summary: Queries the details of the databases or tables that can be restored.

DescribeParameterGroup.title: DescribeParameterGroup
DescribeParameterGroup.summary: Queries the information about a parameter template.

DescribeParameterGroups.title: DescribeParameterGroups
DescribeParameterGroups.summary: Queries parameter templates that are available in a specified region.

DescribeParameterTemplates.title: DescribeParameterTemplates
DescribeParameterTemplates.summary: Queries the default parameters in a cluster.

DescribePendingMaintenanceAction.title: DescribePendingMaintenanceAction
DescribePendingMaintenanceAction.summary: Queries the information about a pending event.

DescribePendingMaintenanceActions.title: DescribePendingMaintenanceActions
DescribePendingMaintenanceActions.summary: Queries the numbers of scheduled events for different types of tasks.

DescribePolarSQLCollectorPolicy.title: DescribePolarSQLCollectorPolicy
DescribePolarSQLCollectorPolicy.summary: Queries whether the SQL Explorer feature is enabled for the cluster.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions and zones that are supported by PolarDB.

DescribeScheduleTasks.title: DescribeScheduleTasks
DescribeScheduleTasks.summary: Queries the details of all scheduled tasks.

DescribeSlowLogs.title: DescribeSlowLogs
DescribeSlowLogs.summary: Queries the statistics about the slow query logs of a PolarDB cluster.

DescribeTasks.title: DescribeTasks
DescribeTasks.summary: Queries the status of the tasks that are generated based on API operations, such as the status of instance creation tasks.

DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList.title: DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList
DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList.summary: Queries the Key Management Service (KMS)-managed customer master keys (CMKs) that are used to encrypt data in a PolarDB cluster.

EnableFirewallRules.title: EnableFirewallRules
EnableFirewallRules.summary: Modifies the status of SQL firewall rules for a cluster.

FailoverDBCluster.title: FailoverDBCluster
FailoverDBCluster.summary: Performs a manual failover to promote a read-only node to the primary node in a PolarDB cluster.

GrantAccountPrivilege.title: GrantAccountPrivilege
GrantAccountPrivilege.summary: Grants a standard account the permissions to access one or more databases in a specified PolarDB cluster.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to one or more PolarDB clusters, or the PolarDB clusters to which one or more tags are added.

ModifyAccountDescription.title: ModifyAccountDescription
ModifyAccountDescription.summary: Modifies the description of a database account of a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyAccountPassword.title: ModifyAccountPassword
ModifyAccountPassword.summary: Changes the password of a database account for a specified PolarDB cluster.

ModifyActiveOperationTasks.title: ModifyActiveOperationTasks
ModifyActiveOperationTasks.summary: Modifies the switching time of scheduled O\\\&M events for an instance.

ModifyAutoRenewAttribute.title: ModifyAutoRenewAttribute
ModifyAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Modifies the auto-renewal attributes of a subscription PolarDB cluster.

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the automatic backup policy of a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBCluster.title: ModifyDBCluster
ModifyDBCluster.summary: Modifies the configurations of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterAccessWhitelist.title: ModifyDBClusterAccessWhitelist
ModifyDBClusterAccessWhitelist.summary: Creates or modifies the whitelists (IP whitelists and security groups) of a specified cluster.

ModifyDBClusterAndNodesParameters.title: ModifyDBClusterAndNodesParameters
ModifyDBClusterAndNodesParameters.summary: Modifies cluster parameters and applies them to specified nodes.

ModifyDBClusterArch.title: ModifyDBClusterArch
ModifyDBClusterArch.summary: Changes the high availability mode of the cluster.

ModifyDBClusterAuditLogCollector.title: ModifyDBClusterAuditLogCollector
ModifyDBClusterAuditLogCollector.summary: Enables or disables SQL collector for a PolarDB cluster. The features related to SQL collector include Audit Logs and SQL Explorer.

ModifyDBClusterDeletion.title: ModifyDBClusterDeletion
ModifyDBClusterDeletion.summary: Enables or disables the cluster lock feature for a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBClusterDescription.title: ModifyDBClusterDescription
ModifyDBClusterDescription.summary: Modifies the name of a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBClusterEndpoint.title: ModifyDBClusterEndpoint
ModifyDBClusterEndpoint.summary: Modifies the attributes of a specified PolarDB cluster endpoint. For example, you can modify the following attributes for the specified cluster endpoint: read/write mode, consistency level, transaction splitting, primary node accepts read requests, and connection pool. You can also call the operation to specify whether newly added nodes are automatically associated with the specified cluster endpoint.

ModifyDBClusterMaintainTime.title: ModifyDBClusterMaintainTime
ModifyDBClusterMaintainTime.summary: Modifies the maintenance window of a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBClusterMigration.title: ModifyDBClusterMigration
ModifyDBClusterMigration.summary: Switches or rolls back the task that migrates data from ApsaraDB for RDS to PolarDB.

ModifyDBClusterMonitor.title: ModifyDBClusterMonitor
ModifyDBClusterMonitor.summary: Modifies the interval at which the monitoring data of a PolarDB cluster is collected.

ModifyDBClusterParameters.title: ModifyDBClusterParameters
ModifyDBClusterParameters.summary: Modifies the parameters of a specified PolarDB cluster or applies existing parameter templates to a specified cluster.

ModifyDBClusterPrimaryZone.title: ModifyDBClusterPrimaryZone
ModifyDBClusterPrimaryZone.summary: Changes the primary zone of a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBClusterResourceGroup.title: ModifyDBClusterResourceGroup
ModifyDBClusterResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the configurations of a resource group for a database cluster.

ModifyDBClusterSSL.title: ModifyDBClusterSSL
ModifyDBClusterSSL.summary: Enables or disables the SSL encryption feature for a PolarDB cluster, or updates the CA certificate of the cluster.

ModifyDBClusterServerlessConf.title: ModifyDBClusterServerlessConf
ModifyDBClusterServerlessConf.summary: Modifies the configurations of a serverless cluster.

ModifyDBClusterStoragePerformance.title: ModifyDBClusterStoragePerformance
ModifyDBClusterStoragePerformance.summary: Changes the storage performance of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterStorageSpace.title: ModifyDBClusterStorageSpace
ModifyDBClusterStorageSpace.summary: Changes the storage capacity of a pay-as-you-go cluster of Enterprise Edition or a cluster of Standard Edition.

ModifyDBClusterTDE.title: ModifyDBClusterTDE
ModifyDBClusterTDE.summary: Enables the transparent data encryption (TDE) feature for a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBDescription.title: ModifyDBDescription
ModifyDBDescription.summary: Modifies the description of a database in a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBEndpointAddress.title: ModifyDBEndpointAddress
ModifyDBEndpointAddress.summary: Modifies the endpoints of a PolarDB cluster, including the primary endpoint, default cluster endpoint, custom cluster endpoint, and private domain name.

ModifyDBNodeClass.title: ModifyDBNodeClass
ModifyDBNodeClass.summary: Changes the node specifications of a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBNodeHotReplicaMode.title: ModifyDBNodeHotReplicaMode
ModifyDBNodeHotReplicaMode.summary: Enables or disables the failover with hot replica feature for a node in a cluster.

ModifyDBNodesClass.title: ModifyDBNodesClass
ModifyDBNodesClass.summary: Changes the specifications of a node in a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyDBNodesParameters.title: ModifyDBNodesParameters
ModifyDBNodesParameters.summary: Modifies the parameters of a node and applies them to specified nodes.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.summary: Modifies the name of a global IP whitelist template.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Modifies the relationship between a cluster and a global IP whitelist template.

ModifyLogBackupPolicy.title: ModifyLogBackupPolicy
ModifyLogBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the retention policy of the log backups in a PolarDB cluster.

ModifyMaskingRules.title: ModifyMaskingRules
ModifyMaskingRules.summary: Modifies or adds a data masking rule.

ModifyPendingMaintenanceAction.title: ModifyPendingMaintenanceAction
ModifyPendingMaintenanceAction.summary: Modifies the switching time of a pending event.

OpenAITask.title: OpenAITask
OpenAITask.summary: Enables the PolarDB for AI feature for a cluster.

RefreshDBClusterStorageUsage.title: RefreshDBClusterStorageUsage
RefreshDBClusterStorageUsage.summary: Updates the storage usage of a cluster.

RemoveDBClusterFromGDN.title: RemoveDBClusterFromGDN
RemoveDBClusterFromGDN.summary: Removes a secondary cluster from a GDN.

ResetAccount.title: ResetAccount
ResetAccount.summary: Resets the permissions of a privileged account for a PolarDB cluster.

ResetGlobalDatabaseNetwork.title: ResetGlobalDatabaseNetwork
ResetGlobalDatabaseNetwork.summary: Rebuilds a secondary cluster in a Global Database Network (GDN).

RestartDBNode.title: RestartDBNode
RestartDBNode.summary: Restarts a node in a PolarDB cluster.

RevokeAccountPrivilege.title: RevokeAccountPrivilege
RevokeAccountPrivilege.summary: Revokes the access permissions on one or more databases from a specified PolarDB standard account.

SwitchOverGlobalDatabaseNetwork.title: SwitchOverGlobalDatabaseNetwork
SwitchOverGlobalDatabaseNetwork.summary: Switches over the primary and secondary clusters in a global database network (GDN).

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags for a PolarDB cluster.

TransformDBClusterPayType.title: TransformDBClusterPayType
TransformDBClusterPayType.summary: Changes the billing method of a PolarDB cluster.

UpgradeDBClusterVersion.title: UpgradeDBClusterVersion
UpgradeDBClusterVersion.summary: Upgrades the kernel version of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.
